page.title: 19Games on Sarn Playground
page.content: A game we play on the netball pitch is {Land,Sea,Air and Space.}The object of the game is to get from land,(a semicirle near the school door)to space (the middle part of the playground)or to sea( another semicircle at the other end of the netball pitch) or you can get to air, (the side of the pitch).There is someone on it.They are there to tick you and you are on it then. Another game on the playground we play is{cops and robs}(police and robbers.)There are about six people who are cops and about twenty robbers who have to got to get to the hedge and back to den without getting tuck.If one of the robbers gets tuck the others try to set them free.The game ends when all the robbers have been caught.
